Heading:
Akshay Kumar hangs off helicopter in scary stunt for Sooryavanshi. He has a warning for you Akshay Kumar took to Instagram to share a picture with Rohit Shetty from the
sets of his upcoming film Sooryavanshi.

Salman Khan on his film's music: I take the final callSalman Khan says that a film's music is the first thing about any movie. He
added that he takes the final call in approving any song for his films.

Salman Khan on intimate scenes in his films: Never say never, but so far I have not done anySalman Khan, in an exclusive interview with IndiaToday.in, opened up about
whether he is ever awkward in his films.

Dhanush on his next Bollywood film: You will hear about it soonDhanush revealed that his next Bollywood project will be announced very soon.
He also said that he will definitely collaborate with Aanand L Rai again.

Kwatha: Aayush Sharma to play an army officer in his second film Aayush Sharma has bagged his second film Kwatha. The 33-year-old will essay
the role of an army officer in the film.

Bharat Movie Review: Salman Khan and Katrina Kaif laugh, weep, deliver a perfect Eid blockbusterSalman Khan returns to the big screen this Eid with Bharat, with Katrina
Kaif. Director Ali Abbas Zafar makes full use of the superstar's strength in
the film and gives his fans Bharat, a character to take home with them.

Saif Ali Khan vs Sushant Singh Rajput: Jawaani Jaaneman to clash with Dil Bechara on November 29Saif Ali Khan's Jawaani Jaaneman will clash with with and Sushant Singh
Rajput's Dil Bechara on November 29.

Article 15: Ayushmann Khurrana's film angers Brahmin community in Uttar PradeshArticle 15 has earned the wrath of the Brahmins in Uttar Pradesh for
allegedly maligning the community.

Salman Khan: Bharat is where I was born, where I will dieSalman Khan, in an exclusive interview with IndiaToday.in, opened up on his

World Environment Day 2019: Bollywood urges fans to say no to air pollution. Akshay Kumar says Hawa Aane DeOn World Environment Day today, Bollywood stars came together to create
awareness about the ill effects of air pollution.

Sushmita Sen reveals organisers had wanted to send Aishwarya Rai for Miss Universe instead of her Even though Sushmita Sen won Miss India, organisers suggested that Aishwarya
Rai Bachchan be sent for Miss Universe pageant.

Jim Sarbh picks Ranveer Singh over Ranbir Kapoor for a one-night standJim Sarbh in a recent interview revealed that he would rather pick Ranveer
Singh over Ranbir Kapoor for a one-night stand. In Padmaavat, Jim played a
character who lusts after Ranveer Singh's Alauddin Khilji.

Was Ananya Panday not allowed to enter a club in Mumbai?Ananya Panday was denied entry to a club in Mumbai as she was underage. The
club allowed people of the age 24 and above. Ananya is 20.

Dhanush to produce Tamil remake of Ayushmann Khurrana and Radhika Apte's Andhadhun?Dhanush is in the process of acquiring the rights for a Tamil remake of

56,000 screens across the country.

Simbu and Hansika go on jeep ride on Maha sets. Are they getting back together?Simbu and Hansika were in a relationship several years ago and parted ways
due to irreconcilable differences. The couple has reunited for a film titled
Maha, directed by UR Jameel.

Thalapathy 63 update: AR Rahman and Atlee oversee edit of two songsThe shooting of Thalapathy 63 is progressing at a brisk pace. Composer AR

The Extraordinary Journey Of The Fakir Trailer out: Dhanush slays it in first foreign filmThe trailer of Dhanush's first foreign film The Extraordinary Journey Of The
Fakir was launched in Mumbai on Tuesday. Along with the new English trailer,

New James Bond film set rocked by stunt explosion, one crew member injuredA controlled explosion on the set of Bond 25 caused damage to the exterior of

Nicolas Cage and Erika Koike get divorced after being married for just 4 daysNicolas Cage and Erika Koike tied the knot on March 23. Just after four days

Keanu Reeves to join the cast of Marvel film The Eternals?Keanu Reeves, who was last seen in the film John Wick: Chapter 3 -

It's official: Robert Pattinson is the new BatmanRobert Pattinson will play the next Batman in Matt Reeves film. Prior to
Robert, Ben Affleck had played the role of the supergero.

The Godfather actor Carmine Caridi dies at 85Carmine Caridi, who played the role of Carmine Rosato in Godfather Part 2,
has died at the age of 85 after being in a coma.

Christopher Nolan to kick off film starring Dimple Kapadia in Mumbai this SeptemberThe Mumbai schedule of Christopher Nolan film, Tenet, will stretch up to

Annabelle Comes Home: Did we need another Conjuring film?Annabelle Comes Home is the next film in the Conjuring Universe. The question
